name: s1000d-schema-viewer
author: St√©phane Dubois
description: This is an XSLT stylesheet I use to read the content of the S1000D XML schemas in a visual way which gives attributes and children elements for each elements

scripts.//: By default the script loads all the xsd files from the data folder but you can pass a path to a different data folder  ie: ./transform.sh ~/Dev/S1000D/Data/4.1
